name: Running Water Fill Out Of Space
name_original: Running Water Fill Out Of Space
description:
/// HOW TO PLAY

Use one of these keysets to control shape of water:

  • ← / → / ↑ / ↓ : Cylinder / Sphere / Frustum Up / Frustum Down
  • A / D / W / S : Cylinder / Sphere / Frustum Up / Frustum Down
  • (Xbox) X / B / Y / A: Cylinder / Sphere / Frustum Up / Frustum Down
  • (Xbox) D-Pad: ← / → / ↑ / ↓ : Cylinder / Sphere / Frustum Up / Frustum Down
  • (Xbox) Left Thumb Stick: ← / → / ↑ / ↓ : Cylinder / Sphere / Frustum Up / Frustum Down

Combine shape in order to match with object on screen. In shape, you need to play and learn. Shape will chose random but at this stage of game, it have many object with same type of order.


gameplay concept

/// STORY BEHIND

SHORT STORY
Vase will running out of space and fill up with water.

LONG STORY

"RUNNING OUT OF SPACE" - that mean about resources, water is source of life. Water also have flexibility, ability to fill it out of space. Water fill our body and our planet.

Heavy industrial, burning, destroy and cut down forest, water pollution, weather dramatic change. Wonder how much time left until running out of forest, fresh water and our living space on this planet.

quick environment concept

That "water" - player, running through endless and soulless forest has been cut down and, heavy factory fill smoke into space in horizon - blue sky is "running out of space". Every time "water" do a right thing, one plant will revive from wilted, and hope for a bright in future...
